meanings.definition: A shrub of the olive family, with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The forsythia in our garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: The forsythia bushes along the path added a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The forsythia seemed to be smiling at the sun with its vibrant blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness radiated like a forsythia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The forsythia's yellow flowers were like drops of sunshine in the garden.

meanings.definition: The bright yellow flowers of the forsythia shrub.
meanings.sent1: I picked a few forsythia to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent2: The forsythia's yellow blossoms signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent3: The forsythia flowers danced in the breeze, spreading joy around.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a bouquet of forsythia.
meanings.sent5: The forsythia's blooms were a cheerful sight on a gloomy day.
